attributes.action: Stop the government extending the March 29th Brexit exit date
attributes.additional_details: Leave means Leave a Democratic Vote was taken and the vote by 14.4 million people was to leave not to get a deal that suits remainers
attributes.background: To stop the Government extending our exit date of March 29th from the EU THE LAW SAY WE LEAVE AND THEY HAVE HAD 2 years to sort a deal any extension would be futile
